other_tests.findings: Distal esophagitis; nonbleeding linear ulceration in the gastric antrum; marked edema in the prepyloric antrum; nonbleeding, cratered ulcer in the pyloric channel; partial gastric-outlet obstruction.
Necrotizing granulomatous inflammation with eosinophilic debris; centriacinar emphysema; degenerating helminth consistent with a lung fluke.
New nodule in the left lower lobe with surrounding ground-glass opacification; clustered centrilobular cysts and ground-glass nodules unchanged.
other_tests.changes_over_time: New nodule identified compared to previous scans.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
other_tests.findings: Unchanged compared with prior imaging studies.
Positive for antibodies against Schistosoma mansoni; negative for paragonimus antibody.
